description: Gets a list of all mitigation actions that match the specified filter criteria. Requires permission to access the ListMitigationActions action.

nested_items.name: actionIdentifiers
nested_items.description: A set of actions that matched the specified filter criteria.

nested_items.name: actionName
nested_items.description: The friendly name of the mitigation action.

nested_items.name: actionArn
nested_items.description: The IAM role ARN used to apply this mitigation action.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date when this mitigation action was created.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results.
